name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask (Limited Edition Adventure Set)
description:
The Limited Edition Adventure Set of Majora's Mask had a limited run of 1000 individually numbered boxes and included:
  • The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask PAL Game.
  • Music of the Ancients (Majora's Mask Double CD Original Soundtrack).
  • Certificate of Authenticity.
  • Mystic Clocktown Watch.
  • Majora's Magic Robe T-shirt.
  • Eternal Power Badge (Pin).
  • Badge of Braveness (Pin).
  • Wallpaper.
  • Mark of the Chosen Sticker.

releases.country: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, The Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
